MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual IAsyncResult BeginShouldRedirectFind (System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria resolveCriteria, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginShouldRedirectFind(class System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria resolveCriteria, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function BeginShouldRedirectFind (resolveCriteria As FindCriteria, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
protected: virtual IAsyncResult ^ BeginShouldRedirectFind(System::ServiceModel::Discovery::FindCriteria ^ resolveCriteria, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

abstract member BeginShouldRedirectFind : System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult override this.BeginShouldRedirectFind : System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.name: resolveCriteria
param.span: 描述要尋找之服務的解析準則。

span.span: The resolve criteria that describes the service to find.

param.name: callback
param.span: 作業已完成時要呼叫的回呼委派。

span.span: The callback delegate to call when the operation has completed.

param.name: state
param.span: 使用者定義的狀態資料。

span.span: The user-defined state data.

summary.span: 覆寫此方法以允許探索 Proxy 在收到多點傳送尋找要求時，送出多點傳送隱藏訊息。

span.span: Override this method to allow the discovery proxy to send out multicast suppression messages when it receives a multicast find request.

returns.span: 暫止的非同步作業參考。

span.span: A reference to the pending asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 探索 Proxy 可用時，可傳送多點傳送隱藏訊息，來回應多點傳送尋找或解析訊息。Multicast suppression messages can be sent in response to a multicast find or resolve message when a discovery proxy is available. 傳送多點傳送訊息到探索 Proxy，有助於降低由探索作業所引起的網路流量。Sending unicast messages to the discovery proxy can help reduce the amount of network traffic caused by the discovery operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 探索 Proxy 可用時，可傳送多點傳送隱藏訊息，來回應多點傳送尋找或解析訊息。Multicast suppression messages can be sent in response to a multicast find or resolve message when a discovery proxy is available. 傳送多點傳送訊息到探索 Proxy，有助於降低由探索作業所引起的網路流量。Sending unicast messages to the discovery proxy can help reduce the amount of network traffic caused by the discovery operations.
